1: Lord, who may enter your Holy Tent? Who may live on your holy mountain?
2: Only a person who is innocent and who does what is right. He must speak the truth from his heart.
3: He must not tell lies about others. He must do no wrong to his neighbors. He must not gossip.
4: He must not respect hateful people. He must honor those who honor the Lord. He must keep his promises to his neighbor, even when it hurts.
5: He must not charge interest on money he lends. And he must not take money to hurt innocent people. Whoever does all these things will never be destroyed.
